resources.string: We\'ve detected that your device is not secure. Pasbox can\'t guarantee the safety of your passwords stored on this device and you will not be able to use our online services. You may use Pasbox only on this device if you wish.

Google Play Services are not installed on this device. Pasbox needs them to guarantee the safety of your passwords. You will not be able to use our online services, but you may continue using Pasbox only on this device.

Your device has an old version of Google Play Services. Pasbox requires the latest version of Google Play Services to guarantee the safety of your passwords. You will not be able to use our online services until you update Google Play Services. You may continue to use Pasbox only on this device.
Your device is updating Google Play Services and until that has finished you\'ll have limited options to use Pasbox.
